item.title: Paul Mellon and His Ponies, at Saratoga’s Racing Museum
item.description: No horse hockey here, only a solid, fascinating history of thoroughbred sport.

item.description: Texas Democrat Rep. Colin Allred has used the border wall in his campaign despite historically opposing it.

item.title: We Need Billionaires in Space
item.description: The first private space walk in history promises to be the beginning of private crews’ expanding humanity’s reach into the stars.

item.title: Yes, Foreign Nationals Have Voted In U.S. Elections — And Many More Could This Year
item.description: With massive leftist voter registration efforts in play, election integrity advocates warn of many more noncitizens on voter rolls.

item.title: The States Are Dangerously Dependent on Medicaid-Expansion Dollars
item.description: As some of the last holdout states consider accepting the Obamacare-expansion deal, the risks of the program are becoming apparent.

item.title: Like Her Campaign, Kamala’s 2024 Platform Is Largely About Nothing
item.description: Harris is running a 'vibes' campaign that focuses more on her personality than on her (very radical) policies.

item.title: The Constitutional Quandary Only School Choice Can Resolve
item.description: Forcing religious families to pay taxes for secular public schools and for education consistent with their beliefs cannot stand.

item.title: Washington Post Hit Piece Paints Elon Musk As ‘Uniquely Dangerous’ For Standing Up For Free Speech
item.description: The Washington Post employs the Dems' political talking point: that those who question U.S. elections are a threat to democracy.

item.title: Larry Hogan makes stopping school shootings top issue in high-stakes Senate race
item.description: Former Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan says he will fight for a federal law requiring armed officers in every high school if elected to the Senate.

item.title: Protectionist Laws an Overlooked Cause of Supply-Chain Disruptions
item.description: Globalization can’t solve everything, but reducing trade barriers can lessen their harm and help keep the economy humming.

item.title: South Dakota’s ‘Pro-Life’ Politicians Notoriously Silent On Extremist Abortion Amendment
item.description: South Dakota Republicans are keeping their lips sealed about the dangers posed by until-birth abortion Amendment G.
